english.segment1: From the Birds that Sing, In the Tallest Trees. To the Human Life, of you and me. From the Desert Sands, to the place we stand. He is God of All, He is Everything.
english.segment3: I'm giving my life to the only one who makes the Moon reflect the sun. Every Starry Night, that was His design. I'm giving my life to the only son, who was and is and yet to come. Let the praises ring, 'cause he is everything. 'Cause he is everything
english.segment4: From the Autumn Leaves, that will ride the breeze. To the Faith it takes, to pray and sing. From the Painted sky, to my pain filled eye. He is God of all, He is everything
english.segment6: I'm giving my life to the only one who makes the Moon reflect the sun. Every Starry Night, that was His design. I'm giving my life to the only son,who was and is and yet to come. Let the praises ring, 'cause he is everything.
english.segment8: Hallelujah (Hallelujah). Hallelujah. I believe. Ohhh. Hallelujah (Hallelujah). Hallelujah. I believe
english.segment9: I'm giving my life to the only one who makes the Moon reflect the sun. On that Starry Night, He changed my life. I'm giving it all to the only son who gave me hope when I had none. So let the praises ring, Ohhhh Let the Praises Ring
english.segment10: I'm giving my life to the only one who makes the Moon reflect the sun. Every Starry Night, that was His design. I'm giving my life to the only son, who was and is and yet to come. and the Angels sing, that he is Heavenly
english.segment11: So let the Praises ring. 'Cause he everything
